description: Take your HERO5 Black, HERO6 Black, HERO7 Black or HERO 2018  into deep water. The case lets you film down to depths of 60m and protects your camera land-based hazards like sand, impacts, debris or flying gravel. Allows you to access all the camera buttons and provides sharp images above or below the waterline.Durable plastic housing is waterproof to 60m.Flat glass lens on the housing delivers sharp images above and below water.2 waterproof backdoors let you use it with a GoPro Floaty (sold separately).Skeleton backdoor improves audio capture above water (not recommended for underwater use).
name: GoPro Super Suit (Uber Protection+Dive Housing)
